title: Courier Rounded
content: What's the foundry that sells the rounded courier? I can't find it. Google failed me.
author: HaleyFiege

comments.content: URW Typewriter is also rounded, especially at the heavy weights.

Your link refers to the [wrong thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619174443/http:/typophile.com/node/36935), Stewf. Here’s [URW Typewriter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619174443/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/urw_typewriter_bold/?sample_text=Rounded%20Typewriter&sample_size=36).

"Do you mean Courier Sans? That’s Lineto …"

Thats the one.

Thank you!
